Functions

template<typename PointDataGridT >
void loadPoints (PointDataGridT &grid)
 Loads all leaf node voxel data in the given grid.
template<typename PointDataGridT , typename MaskGridT >
void loadPoints (PointDataGridT &grid, const MaskGridT &mask)
 Loads all leaf node voxel data in the given grid that overlap with mask grid leaf nodes.
template<typename PointDataGridT >
void loadPoints (PointDataGridT &grid, const BBoxd &bbox)
 Load the leaf node voxel data in the given grid that overlap with a world-space bounding box.
